description.p: A Draughting_annotation_occurrence is the explicit definition of a patch, or assembly of patches, of colour, shading or texture on a 2D drawing.
description.note: The information that shall be recorded for a Draughting_annotation_occurrence is specified by ISO 10303-504 'Draughting annotation'. The use of this entity denotes a shared scope with ISO 10303-201 and ISO 10303-202.
